RESOURCE.STRING: The grid heaters are set to be on for %s seconds. A click should be heard if the grid heater is operative. Press 'Start' to begin the test.
This test is used to manually turn ON/OFF the intake air heater solenoid(s).
This test is not supported by the current calibration.

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16100</ErrorNumber> <Description> An unknown exception occurred during the Intake Air Heater ECM test. </Description> <Suggestion>Please restart INSITE. If the problem persists, contact the INSITE Help Desk </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16101</ErrorNumber> <Description> A pointer to the Intake Air Heater Override Helper could not be gotten. </Description> <Suggestion> Reinstall INSITE </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16102</ErrorNumber> <Description> Failure to start the test. </Description> <Suggestion> Restart INSITE If the problem occurs persistently, please contact the INSITE Help Desk</Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16103</ErrorNumber> <Description>An error occurred while writing a parameter to the ECM. </Description> <Suggestion> </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16104</ErrorNumber> <Description> An error occurred while reading a parameter. </Description> <Suggestion> </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16105</ErrorNumber> <Description> Invalid value for the 24 Volt Enable parameter. </Description> <Suggestion> Recalibrate the ECM with a valid calibration </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16106</ErrorNumber> <Description>The parameter being read had an invalid value. </Description> <Suggestion> Recalibrate the ECM with a valid calibration</Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16107</ErrorNumber> <Description>This action can not be completed at this time. The ECM is currently locked by another activity in progress and is not available.</Description> <Suggestion> This may be caused by an ECM test running or a calibration download in progress.Please try again after the activity has completed.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

The grid heaters are set to be on for a maximum of %s seconds. In order to prevent damage please remove the Intake Manifold Temperature sensor prior to starting the test. When running the test a click should be heard if the grid heater is operative. Press 'Start' to begin the test. Note: The ECM will automatically stop the test if the intake manifold temperature exceeds %s
The maximum number of Intake Air Heater overrides has been reached. If additional troubleshooting is required exit the test, allow the Intake Air Heater to cool, and re-enter the test.
This test is not supported by the current calibration.
This test is used to manually turn ON/OFF the intake air heater solenoid.

Initial Conditions 1. Key Switch on Steps 1. Select Start 2. Select the Intake Air Heater to turn it on Additional Information 1. Test runs for a maximum of %s seconds 2. If required, select Stop to end the test early 3. The Intake Air Heater overrides will be limited to three to prevent overheating. If additional troubleshooting is required exit the test, allow the Intake Air Heater to cool, and re-enter the test
